title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 86.14 - Emergency service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 86.14 - Emergency service

State Regulations

The following kinds of service may be furnished, given or
sold to a retailer: (a) coil cleaning
service at a time of emergency, when such retailer is unable to procure the
service of the person outside the industry usually performing such work for the
retailer; (b) emergency repairs to
tapping equipment and pressure system; and
(c) connecting precoolers in the spring
season and disconnecting them in the autumn season. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
86.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
